item.title: 2 questions hopefully 2 answears
item.dc:creator: @ZTR_Zac ZTR Zac
item.description:
@ZTR_Zac wrote:

The problem with mopar is it knows all the text in the game without you declaring. This means that the info your looking for myt not be in you client base. It took me a while to figure this out. Im going to paste all the emote tab codes because the line ID’s arent in ordder, These are the only emote tab codes i could find modify the text and it will change it the game. Simply paste it in your public void initialize() outside any { }

sendFrame126("@red@Spec", 180);//frist emote slot sendFrame126("@blu@H@cya@o@blu@m@cya@e", 181); sendFrame126("Panel", 178); sendFrame126("1a", 175); sendFrame126("3a", 177); sendFrame126("@blu@R@cya@u@blu@n", 182); sendFrame126("2", 185); sendFrame126("3", 186); sendFrame126("7b", 173); sendFrame126("5a", 179); sendFrame126("4", 187); sendFrame126("2a", 176);

Hope i helped

Read full topic
